notes.title: Update
notes.text:
- Added sound volume sliders.
- Updated Chat Scanner with requested features.
- Updated Support tab.
- Fixed the bug with notifications not displaying after some time.
- Fixed the bug related to having too many notificatons.

If you love MercuryTrade so much it has become your favourite application to play the game - show your appreciation by supporting it!
If you have troubles updating please download directly from github. Thanks!
